snippet: If he can carry his momentum to other states, Ron Paul will probably gain influence in the national Republican Party platform.
abstract: Few Republican strategists expect Ron Paul to be elected president, but his third-place finish in the Iowa Republican caucuses shows that at the least he will be a force to be reckoned with in the primaries, and in GOP politics.

byline.original: By RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr. and SHERYL GAY STOLBERG
byline.contributor: Richard A Oppel Jr. reported from Ankeny, Iowa, and Sheryl Gay Stolberg from Washington.

lead_paragraph: If he can carry his momentum to other states, Ron Paul will probably gain influence in the national Republican Party platform.

headline.seo: Backers Hope Paul’s Iowa Strategy Will Move His Message
headline.main: Backers Hope Paul’s Iowa Strategy Will Move His Message
headline.print_headline: Paul, Influence Assured, May Face More Attacks
